overview: Four sensual tales. In "The Thing", Cherie swings by to borrow a necklace from Monica, and Quinton is there...all alone. As effortlessly sexy as ever. In "This is It",  Adria is faced with the reality that monogamy was never for her.  In "One Last Chance", we realzie that nothing about Scarlit and Damons relationship worked, with the exception of the sex. When they finally decide they cant keep doing this- Scarlit kicks Damon out- just as soon as he fucks her one last time. In "Welcome Back", Emily and Charles are magnetically attracted to each other from the get-go, but they spent the entire spring holding back . . . until Emily's last day working for him, when they both gave in.
title: Infidelity & Indiscretions
